items.name: Apply: Disable Geforce Driver Update
items.description: [Focus: FPS] Disables NVIDIA update-related scheduled tasks and telemetry services.

args: Get-Service | Where-Object {$_.Name -match 'NvTelemetry'} | ForEach-Object { try { Set-Service $_.Name -StartupType Disabled -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Stop-Service $_.Name -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} }
Get-Service | Where-Object {$_.Name -match 'NvTelemetry'} | ForEach-Object { try { Set-Service $_.Name -StartupType Manual -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} }

items.description: [Focus: FPS] Disables NVIDIA update-related scheduled tasks and telemetry services.
items.name: Revert: Disable Geforce Driver Update

args: Get-Service | Where-Object {$_.Name -match 'NvTelemetry'} | ForEach-Object { try { Set-Service $_.Name -StartupType Manual -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} }
